effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120

short_effect.sun-moon: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.
